CatDescriptText: Kary Leonard, 2009 Rose Street, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 14, 1959, pg. A1 with question: "Do you think the recreational facilities for young people in Pittsburgh are adequate? If not, what do you think should be done about it?" answer reads: "No, there are not enough facilities.  I see youngsters playing in street and risking ther [sic] lives in order to have a good time.  Some might get killed.  Tax money is pent for other things, therefore I say that tax money should be spent for this purpose, which is to help our children in a big way."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Kary Leonard wearing dark pea coat, moustache, and cap, standing on sidewalk with fire hydrant and other men standing in background
